remarks: Show equality with the span of the sum of two vectors, one of which ( ` X ` ) is fixed in advance.  Compare ~ lspfixed .  (Contributed by NM, 29-May-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lsatfixed.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lsatfixed.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lsatfixed.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatfixed.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lsatfixed.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatfixed.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatfixed.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lsatfixed.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lsatfixed.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lsatfixed.e $e |- ( ph -> Q =/= ( N ` { X } ) ) $.
lsatfixed.f $e |- ( ph -> Q =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lsatfixed.g $e |- ( ph -> Q C_ ( N ` { X , Y } ) ) $.
lsatfixedN $p |- ( ph -> E. z e. ( ( N ` { Y } ) \ { .0. } ) Q = ( N ` { ( X .+ z ) } ) ) $.
$d .+ z $.
$d .0. z $.
$d N z $.
$d Q z $.
$d V z $.
$d W z $.
$d X z $.
$d Y z $.
$d ph z $.
